Subject: Invitation to Discuss Emerging Pet Care Trends on “Paws & Podcasts"

Hi Dr. Patel,

I’m Jordan Lee, host of the “Paws & Podcasts” show where we explore the latest developments in pet health and wellness. Our listeners are especially interested in cutting‑edge nutrition research, and your pioneering work on holistic diets for pets aligns perfectly with our upcoming episode “Emerging Pet Care Trends 2025”.

We would love to have you share your insights on how nutrition is evolving, practical advice for pet owners, and what exciting research lies ahead. The interview would be a relaxed 30‑minute conversation, recorded remotely at a time convenient for you.

Would you be available in the next two weeks? I’m happy to work around your schedule and can provide any additional details you need.

Thank you for considering this invitation – it would be an honor to feature your expertise.

Warm regards,
Jordan Lee
Host, Paws & Podcasts
jordan@paws-podcasts.com
